communicate_checks.justification:
Information '17.99' communicated in the message:
 'The cheapest available Desk Lamp we have in stock is the black model with medium brightness and an AC adapter power source (Item ID: 5320792178), priced at $135.24.

Since your current lamp (Item ID: 9190635437) costs $153.23, you will receive a refund of **$17.99** to your gift card (ID: gift_card_7245904).

Please note that this modification can only be performed once for this order. Once processed, the order status will change to "pending (items modified)," and you will no longer be able to cancel or further modify it.

Are you sure you want to proceed with swapping the Desk Lamp in order #W9300146 for the $135.24 model and receiving a $17.99 refund to your gift card? Please confirm by saying "yes."'
